text.content:
Disclaimers:

Game Status:

Game Design: Open Beta, Burgundy Version, read more here.

Foundry System/Module Development: Alpha, read more here.

Game Designer/Narrator:

I am Greek, I am not a native English speaker. I do have an accept, and although I might sound like I know what I am talking about most of the time there might be instances where something is lost in translation.

Roleplay:

I will be reading some pre-written descriptions, but I will also be doing improv RP and descriptions. I will attempt to do accents, impersonations, but I am not an actor. Apologies to anyone that might be offended.

No-go Zones:

If there any no-go zones, veils, or lines not to be crossed during our game-time, please send them to me via private message, preferably before even the Session begins

no go zones: private. I will make sure not to be included in my Narration, and steer away any other Players from going anywhere near those topics you do not wish to be included.

Recording/Streaming:

Make sure everyone is align with the use of this Session.

Depending on the Players & Protagonists:

Each Introductory Session has a lot of unique elements to it based on with who I am playing with. Depending on the story though, the following concepts might be included: violence, foul language, guns, knives, lightning, fire, ¬†death, mind controlling, mind reading, mind bending, spirits, reality warping, psychic whispers, turning into a machine, cosmic horrors.

¬†Feedback:

Feedback at the end, brutally honest I can take it üòä

Schedule

Part 1 (1 hour): System tutorial,¬†Foundry Tutorial, and¬†Protagonist¬†selection

¬†Part 2 (1 Hour): ¬†First Scene of the¬†Session. The¬†Narrator¬†will describe the setting and bring the¬†Coalition¬†together.

¬†Part 3 (1 hour ): ¬†Second Scene of the¬†Session. Action Scene involving lots of dice rolls, intense roleplay, perilous combat & more!

¬†Part 4 (30 min):¬†¬†Epilogue and feedback.

Breaks will commence in-between Parts & at any Players request.

Check Lists

Before Session:

  • Voice Meter: Couch POTATO! Restart!

  • RESET FOG!

  • Activate Lobby Scene

  • Delete Players. New Players (dice so nice message)

  • All player Password = Metanthropes

  • ¬†¬†¬† VOICE METER: remove B2 fromVAIO3

Post the following on chat:

Welcome to üèÅ Introductory Session

Become a member [Suggested: via Discord]

https://www.metanthropes.com/register

¬†

The 10 pre-made Protagonists:

https://www.metanthropes.com/protagonists/

¬†

¬†

The 10 Metapowers:

https://www.metanthropes.com/metapowersfornewmembers/

Event page:

(copy paste from website)

Get Together

  • Chrome > Mozilla > Firefox..

  • ¬† *PC? Laptop? X2 MONITORS OR NOT?

  • 3D Dice, Dice so Nice

  • MUSIC Playlist ‚Äúworld‚Äù volume,

  • PROTAGONIST SELECTION (compendium see actors. Click on them for preview

  • Import Protagonist. Assign. (Stream=Observer)

  • ASSIGN PLAYER from Summary!

¬†

Tutorial

Activate Tutorial Scene

UNPAUSE Game

Drag and Drop Lobby.

Move around test.

Drag & Drop / Arrows.

Right Click= Move map¬†

Open/Close doors.

Bottom Right corner = Ambient Sound


Game's System

¬†Character Sheet: Resize Cool buttons!!!

Actor Tab: Double Click [POP UP!/MINIMIZE].

HOVER: ACRO & CS (((TOOLKITs))).

Roll Stat

Spend Destiny

Roll Metapower / Possession

Activate Metapower/ Possesion

Right Click

Summary. Finalize {include NAME}

{ADD PICTURE}.

Drag and Drop Scene 1.

¬†

Activate Scene 1

  • Sequencer = Chain Lightning :)

    Clear Chat

    • SYNC CAROUSEL ¬†

. Free Movement after CUTSCENE

¬†

Other

Did my Turn end? Use arrows at my Portrait at Carousel Initiative:

For Narrators: Did a Protagonist WAIT: Go to the Combat Encounters and add a .5 in-between Characters. For example, from Initiative 5 put them in 2.5)

Dice Rolls (for additional levels of Success or otherwise)

EDIT THIS JOURNAL: then copy paste to chat

[[/roll 1d10x10]]

[[/roll 2d10x10]]

[[/roll 3d10x10]]

[[/roll 4d10x10]]

" In a quiet corner of¬†the expansive Multiverse, in a modern world much like our own, a group of strangers shall come together. Guided by the invisible hand of destiny, they find themselves inexplicably drawn to an aged opera house, a relic of forgotten elegance. Within its walls, an enigmatic performance unfolds. Little do they know, that each of them is a Metanthrope, gifted with a unique, extraordinary ability. What will happen, and which machinations led them there, is up to them to figure out."

Welcome, Narrators, to your exclusive realm within "Metanthropes: Introductory Zine." This section is reserved for your eyes only, filled with essential "behind-the-screen" insights to masterfully conduct the introductory story. To preserve the thrill and mystery for Players, we advise them to steer clear of this Chapter and avoid spoilers.

Here, you'll find a treasure trove of resources:

‚Ä¢ Detailed NPCs and Antagonists: Get to know the Characters that will shape your Protagonists‚Äô journey.

‚Ä¢ Scenes and Settings: Vivid descriptions of locations and setups for each pivotal moment in the story.

‚Ä¢ Dialogue and Options: Dynamic options to steer conversations and influence the story's path.

‚Ä¢ Story Resolutions: Various outcomes to adapt the narrative flow and keep players engaged.

Designed as a one-shot adventure, this story is your canvas to create an unforgettable experience. While it's tailored for a single session, feel free to expand the gameplay or continue the Protagonists adventures through the vast expanses of the Metanthropes Multiverse.

For additional insights into the rich worldbuilding and lore of Metanthropes, visit Metanthropes.com.

The introductory adventure is more than a Session; it's a gateway. It brings together a Group of strangers, forging bonds through shared challenges and unveiling a glimpse into the grand tapestry of the Metanthropes Cosmos. Prepare to lead your players into a world of infinite possibilities, where every choice weaves into the larger narrative of Metanthropes.

Behind the Curtain

Somewhere, somewhen, the Prime Timeline weaves its elusive course through the Cosmos. It is from this foundational reality that the Orchestrators‚ÄîMetanthropes of near-omnipotence‚Äîhave crafted an extraordinary bastion. This ethereal city, transcending the bounds of space and time, serves as a sanctuary and a vantage point.

In this otherworldly realm, the Conductors, agents of the Orchestrators, peer across countless Timelines. Their task is monumental yet precise: to craft Timelines where new Metanthropes will emerge and to guide them into the fold of this cosmic tapestry.

The Protagonists of our story hail from disparate, ‚Äúphantom‚Äù Timelines. Covertly, they are summoned by the Conductors to an opera that acts as a nexus, an inter-Timeline crossroad. Here, in this grand stage of possibilities, they are to demonstrate their prowess and potential for teamwork within a Coalition. It's a test, a challenge for them to harness their Metapowers and combine into a formidable unit.

The Conductors' ultimate goal is twofold: firstly, to introduce the Protagonists to the vast, intricate chessboard of the Multiverse‚Äîa symphony in which they are now inextricably instruments. Secondly, to present them with a choice that echoes through realities: to align with a Multiversal Faction, embark on a new Timeline and mission, or to return to their original worlds, alone.

This choice marks a turning point, a moment of revelation and decision. It's where destinies intertwine, and the grand opera of Metanthropes unfolds, revealing the depth and breadth of a universe brimming with endless narratives and boundless adventures.

Who they really are:

These NPCs are the Conductors. Extremely powerful Metanthropes who answer only to the Orchestrators of the Prime Timeline. From an Immortal king who has lives tens of thousands of years, to a conduit of an entire collective of minds, they are beyond the Stats and Metapowers presented in this version of the game. The form the choose to take here is merely an avatar of who they really are.

The Usher

Appearance:

The Usher, garbed in a traditional uniform, presents a non-binary appearance, blending both feminine and masculine traits. Their red curly hair frames a youthful face, suggestive of their early twenties or late teens. Piercing teal-blue eyes stand out, accompanied by a sprinkling of pimples, adding to their youthful allure. The Usher's aura is a mix of innocence and awkwardness, tinged with playfulness and an undercurrent of mystery.

Summary

Background:

Metamorphosis: Self-Made

Arc: Harmonizer/Catalyst

Regression: Persona/Overenthusiasm

‚ìÇÔ∏èetapowers:

Meta Evocation, Memory Manipulation, Meta Cognition, Ancestral Connection, Luck Bending, Invisibility, Warp Reality

Stats

- Body: 25 Endurance: 55 Power: 45 Reflexes: 65 Mind: 30 Creativity: 60 Manipulation: 50 Perception: 75 Soul: 20 Awareness: 55 Conscience: 25 Willpower: 60

Multiversal Faction: (Autonomia)

The Usher is a member of a unique Multiversal Faction, a collective of Metanthropes dedicated to nurturing and guiding those who find themselves overwhelmed by the vast expanse of the Multiverse. This Faction stands apart in its approach: rather than assigning direct missions across Timelines, it focuses on helping each Metanthrope discover and embrace their uniqueness. Emphasizing individuality, freedom, and self-expression, members of this Faction are so self-aware that they often break the fourth wall, recognizing their existence as characters within a game or simulation. Their role is not just to guide but to enlighten, empowering each Metanthrope to find their path in the cosmic tapestry.

Roleplay:

As the Protagonists enter the opera, the Usher, seemingly engrossed in their own world, perhaps wearing headphones, feigns ignorance of their arrival. They appear busy, typing away on a laptop, and act startled when the Protagonists eventually approach them.

With a hint of surprise, the Usher informs the group that they're late, but luckily, the performance hasn't started yet. Urging them to hurry, the Usher checks their tickets, which the Protagonists have on them, and then leads them through the hallway to the main hall's doors. After wishing them an enjoyable show, the Usher closes the doors somewhat abruptly behind them.

They will show Interest in: (any)

- Arbiter

- Animator

- Clairvoyant

- Manipulator

- Utilitarian

‚ÄÉ

Shavo Chootakian:

Appearance:

Shavo, an elderly figure, stands out in his retro attire reminiscent of the 1930s. He sports a round hat and a glamorous coat, adding to his distinct appearance. Despite his short stature, he commands attention with his somewhat long hair and beard. His facial features, characterized by a long forehead and a prominent jaw, are softened by a warm, inviting smile. Shavo radiates an aura of kindness mingled with mystery, making him seem exceptionally approachable and intriguing.

Summary

- Background:

- Metamorphosis: Meta Bloodline

- Arc: Catalyst/ Protector

- Regression: Overenthusiasm/Anachronism

Metapowers

- ‚ìÇÔ∏è: Freeze TimeGravitational AnchorMirageMorphingProtohumanSpeed ManipulationTransfer Energy

Stats

- Body: 25 Endurance: 55 Power: 45 Reflexes: 65 Mind: 30 Creativity: 60 Manipulation: 50 Perception: 75 Soul: 20 Awareness: 55 Conscience: 25 Willpower: 60

Multiversal Faction:

The Sumerian Kings, a cadre of immortal beings, have been the silent architects of human civilization across countless Timelines. Operating primarily within the enigmatic Nether Dimension, they communicate with spirits and navigate cosmic energies with ease.

Esteemed for their deep reverence for tradition and fraternity, the Sumerian Kings are custodians of lost lore and history. Their wisdom spans the ages, and their guidance has been pivotal in shaping the course of humanity. Unseen yet ever-present, they are the steadfast protectors of mankind, safeguarding the legacy and continuity of human civilization.

Roleplay:

Seated near the entrance at the back of the opera hall, Shavo is the picture of warmth and welcome as the Protagonists enter. His continuous, beaming smile is hard to miss, and he gestures invitingly for anyone who returns it to sit beside him. His demeanor is a blend of politeness and playful humor, making caricaturesque remarks about the delayed start of the show and nostalgically commenting, "They don‚Äôt make performances as they used to."

Shavo hints at having seen this play before, teasing the Protagonists with the promise of an exciting experience ahead. Although he's clearly delighted with the situation, he remains coy, revealing nothing more until the actual performance begins.

- Aegis

- Animator

- Hammer

- Kineticist

‚ÄÉ

Thiruvati Bhrahmani:

Apperance

Thiruvati, a young girl of Asian descent in her late teens, presents a striking image. Her attire is ragged, echoing the life of someone who might be living off the streets, and notably, she wears no shoes. However, a closer inspection reveals much more. Her bright orange eyes sparkle with an unexpected depth of wisdom and brilliance, betraying a keen intellect and experience beyond her years. Her wicked smile, while disarming, carries an air of intimidation and deceit, suggesting layers of complexity and cunning in her character.

Summary

- Background:

- Metamorphosis: Meta Bloodline

- Arc: Protector

- Regression: Overenthusiasm

Metapowers

- ‚ìÇÔ∏è: Freeze TimeGravitational AnchorMirageMorphingProtohumanSpeed ManipulationTransfer Energy

Stats

- Body: 25 Endurance: 55 Power: 45 Reflexes: 65 Mind: 30 Creativity: 60 Manipulation: 50 Perception: 75 Soul: 20 Awareness: 55 Conscience: 25 Willpower: 60

Multiversal Faction (Collectiva)

This Faction believes in the unification of Metanthropes and humans across all renditions of Earth and every Timeline, envisioning a singular, collective existence. Operating primarily within the Astral Dimension, they harness and value psychic energies as a means to connect and unite diverse beings. Their ultimate goal is to bring about a unified leadership under the Metanthropes, guiding mankind towards a collective destiny. While their intentions are geared towards unity, they are sometimes willing to employ any means necessary to achieve this integration, revealing a complex and multifaceted approach to their mission.

Roleplay:

-

- In the theater hall, Thiruvati assumes the guise of a beggar, weaving through the attendees to ask for money. Her interactions are a calculated performance, eventually leading her to a Protagonist she finds particularly interesting. Persistently, she will request money from them, never satisfied with any amount given, always asking for more. This act is not just about the money; she revels in being ignored and is intent on testing the Protagonist's patience.

- As she draws closer, Thiruvati may use her telepathic abilities to intimidate the Protagonist, revealing her knowledge of their true identity. Throughout this encounter, her wicked smile remains, adding a layer of intrigue and challenge to her character.

- Arbiter

- Clairvoyant

- Manipulator

- Utilitrian

Nikko (Quint):

Appearance:

Nikko, a stunning woman of African heritage, stands tall and lean, commanding attention with her shaved head and striking appearance. Her punk-rock style is evident in her attire, featuring a leather jacket paired with fishnet stockings. In her hand, a device casts holographic images, adding a futuristic edge to her persona. Nikko radiates an aura of awe and mystery, her presence a blend of edgy style and enigmatic allure.

Summary

- Background:

- Metamorphosis: Meta Bloodline

- Arc: Protector

- Regression: Overenthusiasm

Metapowers

‚Ä¢ ‚ìÇÔ∏è: Freeze TimeGravitational AnchorMirageMorphingProtohumanSpeed ManipulationTransfer Energy

Stats

‚Ä¢ Body: 25 Endurance: 55 Power: 45 Reflexes: 65 Mind: 30 Creativity: 60 Manipulation: 50 Perception: 75 Soul: 20 Awareness: 55 Conscience: 25 Willpower: 60

Multiversal Faction:

Niko's Faction, a group of visionary explorers, delves deep into various Timelines in pursuit of technological breakthroughs. With a profound appreciation for technology, their primary focus lies in the exploration of the Aether Dimension. This Faction skillfully blends Material and Cosmic energies, directing their efforts towards the development of future technologies, progressive ideas, and innovative devices. They are the architects of tomorrow, dedicated to constructing advanced engines and decisively influencing the trajectory of future timelines.

Roleplay:

- Nikko Quint positions herself at a distance from the other Conductors, perched nonchalantly on her balcony seat. With her legs casually dangling over the side, she appears indifferent to the Protagonists' arrival, her attention absorbed by her device. To an observant Protagonist with a successful Performance roll, it becomes evident that Nikko's device is no ordinary cellphone; rather, it's a sleek rectangle of glass from which "touch-screen" holograms are projected. Throughout the initial phase, Nikko purposefully avoids interaction with the Protagonists, maintaining her focus on her holographic device, until the commencement of the Action Scene.

- Animator

- Cosmonaut

- Controller

The Curtain rises

As the curtain gracefully rises, it unveils a starkly simple stage. A wooden floor lays the foundation, scattered with a few classic theater props that seem almost random. The backdrop is adorned with tapestries, each appearing also random at first glance. However, a closer look reveals a deeper connection: there are [NUMBER OF PLAYERS] tapestries. To outsiders, these tapestries might seem inconsequential, but to each Protagonist, one holds a profound meaning. A figure will approach from the side of the stage. To your surprise it is the Usher, which you‚Äôve met earlier. Their voice and tone, from shy and underwhelming now is charismatic as a Narrator and performer on stage.

ACT 1: Metamorphosis

THE USHER: Act 1: Metamorphosis. "The Metamorphosis is a pivotal moment that defines how, when, why, and under what circumstances you cross the threshold from being an human to becoming an extraordinary Metanthrope. It is a transformative event that shapes your identity.

¬†

[CONSCIENCE ROLL + 30%?}

This significant tapestry depicts the scene of their Metamorphosis. The artwork is raw and unrefined, as though created by an amateur artist driven by a single goal ‚Äì to convey a message, possibly a cryptic one. The imagery is simple yet evocative, hinting at deeper layers of meaning.

The Metamorphosis of a Metanthrope can take various forms - a single profound event, an ongoing process, a latent power that has existed since childhood, or a recent experience just before the beginning of our story.

It is the catalyst for a Metanthrope's Metamorphosis can be a driving force that motivates and defines their personality.

Encourage each player to take a turn describing what they see in the tapestry that resonates with their character, based on their Metamorphosis story and personal interpretation. This is a moment for your Players to express themselves creatively; there are no right or wrong descriptions. After each description, ask them how their character feels upon seeing this personal and mysterious depiction."

¬† ‚Äú It defies you, and shows glimpses of you might become..‚Äù ‚Äú

Aftermath of the Action Scene

In the aftermath, a blinding flash coming from the stage halts everything. The only sounds are your own breaths, slowly steadying, and the rhythmic beats of your hearts. From the luminous stage, [NUMBER OF PLAYERS] vibrant, colorful bubbles emerge, each floating towards a Protagonist and pausing just before them.

Peering inside these bubbles, you witness an extraordinary sight: the birth of a universe, galaxies and star systems forming at an astonishing speed. Amidst this cosmic creation, a familiar 'blue planet' orbits a sun ‚Äì your Earth. A profound realization washes over you: in your hands lies the entirety of your own Timeline.

Timelines

Usher: "Act 2: The Multiverse. You spent your days thinking that you were alone, the only one extraordinary, in an ordinary world ‚Ä¶ and you were, at least when it came to your Timeline.

A Timeline encompasses the chronological order of a single universe, from the monumental convergence that ignited time and space, to the inevitable culmination of its cosmic journey.

It includes all matter and energy that exists, existed, and will exists. And the only mater and energy you have ever experienced were those within you called reality, and what we can the Material Dimension.

It is time to be introduced into a far greater cosmos.

Each Timeline houses its own array of Dimensions.

Dimensions

üëÅÔ∏è Dimensions

As you gaze into the bubble, Earth becomes the epicenter of a maelstrom of unknown energies. The scene within the bubble transforms, and simultaneously, so do your surroundings.

Aether

Initially, it appears as if Earth is bathed in white, iridescent waters, cascading like an immense waterfall from a V-shaped source above, flowing down towards the planet. This celestial phenomenon mirrors a future vision of the opera, where reality and the cosmic display intertwine.

NIKO: ‚ÄúDimensions like Aether, The Dimension of what will be ‚Äì but is not made yet‚Äù

[Filter Effects -> Undewater + Color]!

The Aether Dimension is a temporal realm that exists in the future of the Material Dimension. Within Aether lies an ocean of unrealized possibilities and forthcoming wonders. It a realm where unborn souls wander, where marvels not yet constructed can be found, and where ideas not yet conceived take shape.

Astral

Next, Earth in your bubble is enveloped in swirling silver mists, emerging from every cradle of civilization on the planet. This ethereal spectacle seems to reflect a dreamlike state, perhaps an alternate reality of the opera itself.

THIRUVATI: Dimensions like Astral, The landscape of collective imagination.‚Äù

[Filter Effects -> Fog]!

The Astral Dimension is a boundless realm of the mind, existing parallel to the Material Dimension. Within the Astral, the fabric of reality is shaped by imagination, dreams, and subliminal thoughts, giving form to the intangible, and turning fantasies‚Ä¶ and nightmares into tangible manifestations.

Nether

Finally, beneath Earth, a stark contrast is revealed: a narrow streak of black flames burning in a straight line downwards, converging in this momentous event.

SHAVO: Or Dimensions like Nether, the Dimension of what was ‚Äì but is no more‚Äù

[Filter Effects -> Old Film]! [OPERA PAST]

The Nether Dimension is also temporal realm that exists in the past of the Material Dimension. Within the Nether, echoes of forgotten ages resonate, where remnants of the past linger. It is a realm where the forgotten find their resting place ‚Äì from the souls of departed to the ruins of once majestic structures, to tales and ideas lost in the annals of time.

We found you

Another bubble emerges from the stage's bright light, drifting into the Usher's hands. They watch a rapid progression of the Big Bang, leading to their Timeline being shrouded in darkness, then vanishing. The Usher announces, ‚ÄúThe Timeline you originate from, including everything and everyone you knew, is a Phantom Timeline ‚Äì a simulated construct designed to lead to your emergence. And now... we have found you.‚Äù

The Usher continues, ‚ÄúThe emergence of even a single Metanthrope can alter Earth's history. A Coalition of Metanthropes can influence an entire universe. Yet, even a universe is just a fragment of the vastness that exists.‚Äù

As this profound truth sinks in, the bubble symbolizing your reality fades away. Suddenly, countless other bubbles appear, each representing different realities, birthing and vanishing in the expanse around you.

‚Äú Your reality was but one in an infinite multitude.‚Äù

The Multiverse

All Timelines are woven together into a grand tapestry of nigh infinite threads, called the Multiverse. The Multiverse is a vast and intricate web of interconnected realities, encompassing all the Timelines that exist within it. Within this boundless expanse, countless Timelines unfurl, diverging from one another at key moments and branching off into distinct paths. Within the Multiverse, the fates of countless beings are intertwined, their stories echoing and reverberating across each thread. In the Multiverse, every decision made, every action taken, spawns new Timelines that ripple outward, creating a web of infinite possibilities. ‚Äú‚Äù

The question is who will you choose to be inside this vastness of possibilities?

Outside

üëÅÔ∏è Show Picture: Opera Outside

Our Protagonists arrive at their destination at the same time, from different roads. As the world continues its hurried pace, a few solitary souls drift by, the echoes of their footsteps merging with the sounds of the city.

Outside the Opera, an old, forgotten melody lingers in the air, carried by the whispers of time. Neon lights, once vibrant and alive, now flicker with the hesitant breath of a bygone era.

[wind sound effect chill]

The night's embrace tightens, and as the first rumbles of distant thunder resonate, the charm of the inside Opera becomes all the more inviting. Dark clouds weave intricate patterns across the sky, it is only above the opera that the stars are visible. As you approach the entrance you see (NUMBER OF PLAYERS - 1) other people approaching at the same time when suddenly, a powerful gust of wind brushes past [wind sound effect chill], the kind that stirs the soul to seek shelter from an impending tempest. The air hums with an unspoken invitation, beckoning those who dare to step within, to explore the mysteries concealed behind its doors. You enter at the same time and the hissing sounds of the wind abruptly fade behind you with the closing of the doors.

¬†

As all Protagonists enter simultaneously, ask your Players to describe their characters' appearance [üëÅÔ∏è show portraits] and current mood. Then, prompt them for the session's first roll: an Awareness roll.

‚Ä¢ Successful Roll: Hints at a deep connection among the Protagonist and the other attendees entering the opera at the same time.

‚Ä¢ Higher Success Levels: Suggest the presence of an overarching entity observing them.

‚Ä¢ Five or More Success Levels: Indicate that one of these almost divine beings might be the Usher (see below for more about the Usher)

Inside: Reception

¬†

Stepping beyond the threshold, an enchanting revelation awaits, defying the exterior's cloak of neglect. The grandeur of the Opera unfurls within, an unexpected transformation that captures breaths in suspended awe. The main hall, radiantly bathed in the embrace of modern renovations, stands as a testament to timeless beauty rediscovered.

Above, three splendid chandeliers illuminate the expanse below in a symphony of warmth and light.

Twin marble staircases ascend with quiet grace, flanking a closed wooden door that harbors a mystery yet unspoken.

¬†

You are not alone. There is an usher, a young person wearing the traditional Usher outfit of a bygone era, writing something behind their desk.

Opera Hallways

Within the opera's interior, a scarlet velvet carpet with black engravings weave an enigmatic tapestry. To some [*], they conjure the sprawling constellations that adorn the night sky, beckoning dreamers to celestial voyages. To others*], these intricate lines evoke the pathways of neurons, a glimpse into the thoughts that echo through the corridors of the mind. And for *]other imaginative souls, they mirror the roots of an ever-expanding tree.

Balcony #1 Aether:

Balcony #2 Nether:

Main Hall Opera:

The heart of the Opera unveils itself in the splendor of the main hall. Stretching out in a majestic arc, it spans some 50 meters in length, flanked by a breadth of 30 meters and a soaring height of over 10 meters.

At the main hall, a wealth of plush red leather chairs seem very comfortable and inviting. Two balconies extend like wings on either side.

And there, across the expanse, a canvas of rich burgundy curtains conceals the heart of the theater, its enigma magnified by its lingering closure. The show remains an unopened treasure, and the main hall stands as a silent stage, waiting to come alive with the magic of performance.

¬†Alas, our Protagonists shall soon figure out, that the performance, has already began.

Ask for a Perception roll from your Players. Successful results will reveal details on the appearance of the Conductors, and potential Antagonists involved in the main hall.

"Our story begins a short time after your Metamorphosis. Newly awakened to your Metapowers, you're still learning to harness your extraordinary abilities. Yet, you choose to cloak this truth from those around you. The uncertainty of their reactions, the fear of how society might respond, looms over you. As far as you are concerned, there is no one else like you out there. In this new existence, you find yourself between two worlds: the hidden realm of your 'Meta' self, exploring the incredible powers within, and the familiar, everyday 'Anthropic' life, where you must maintain the facade of an ordinary human.

Tonight is one of those evenings. An invitation to an opera house finds its way to you ‚Äì an unusual outing, perhaps, but one you decide to attend. Each of you, drawn here by distinct paths and for varied reasons. Though the night seems ordinary, a sense of destiny hangs in the air, hinting that this event is one ‚Ä¶. not to be missed."

Each Protagonist receives a beckoning, a mysterious invitation intricately woven into the fabric of their 'human' lives. These summons, seemingly from familiar figures, are in truth the work of the Conductors. Narrators can utilize these invitations to create a captivating 'session 0' prelude, enriching the backstory and the mystery surrounding the Protagonists' journey to the opera. Below are examples of potential NPCs and the unique reasons behind each invitation:

‚Ä¢ Aegis: The event is a significant part of your cultural heritage, calling to the roots of your identity.

‚Ä¢ Animator: The spectacle is abuzz in your circles of magicians, illusionists, and stage engineers, piquing your professional curiosity.

‚Ä¢ Arbiter: Esteemed academic minds are discussing this event, suggesting an intellectual allure you can't ignore.

‚Ä¢ Clairvoyant: Your personal research intriguingly leads you to this destination, as if by fate.

‚Ä¢ Controller: Your trusted researchers recommend this performance as a source of inspiration and innovative ideas.

‚Ä¢ Cosmonaut: Your therapist or group leader suggests this place as a means to broaden your perspectives.

‚Ä¢ Hammer: A trusted agent insists this event will be beneficial and potentially lucrative for your career.

‚Ä¢ Kineticist: An encounter with the third man syndrome mysteriously guides you to this event.

‚Ä¢ Manipulator: A vivid dream, almost astral in nature, compels you towards this mysterious gathering.

‚Ä¢ Utilitarian: An informant hints that this place holds the key to saving your loved ones from the shadows of your criminal past.

Play Interrupted

Nikko will abruptly interrupt the Usher and declare that "enough of this! This is not a play, this is an audition!".

And with that declaration, the Action Scene shall commence. Depending on which Antagonist is chosen, the details may vary.

The Action Scene is designed to rigorously test the Protagonists' skills, adaptability, and teamwork. Goal of this Scene, and by an extend of the Conductors, is to challenge the Protagonists. The Players must be pushed to strategically utilize their Destiny reserves, and the Protagonists are expected to receive Conditions, reduce their Life points, compel them to use their Action slots wisely, engage in Multi-Actions, make tactical repositioning, and leverage their unique abilities to their fullest.

Challenging Players:

The Action Scene is an opportunity for each Protagonist to showcase their strengths within the Coalition. Narrators should present Antagonists or challenges that the Coalition can realistically overcome, while highlighting the unique abilities of each Protagonist.

Antagonists

  1. Agents

  2. Civilians:

  3. Cyborgs:

  4. Extradimensional (Anomaly):

  5. Extradimensional (Nightmare-Mora):

  6. Animated Cadaver (Infected):

  7. Therionling:

Consider diversifying the challenges beyond traditional combat. Possible scenarios include:

‚Ä¢ Surviving a Collapsing Opera: Test their quick thinking and agility in a high-stakes environment.

‚Ä¢ Rescuing Civilians: Focus on their capacity for empathy and protection in a crisis.(DARK ENERGY 3 // healing!))

‚Ä¢ A Battle of Wits: Engage them in intellectual duels that require strategic thinking. a vigorous debate concerning how power should be handled

‚Ä¢ Combining Energies: Have them create synergistic effects, like a flux of lightning, gravity, and dark energy.

‚Ä¢ Facing Alternate Selves: Confront them with versions of themselves from other Timelines, challenging their self-perception and adapt.

‚Ä¢ RADIATION BUILDING ^^ ELEMENTAL

‚Ä¢ DISCOVER HIDDEN DOORWAY OUT FROM OPERA (clair)

These varied situations push the Players to think creatively, employ their Protagonists' unique gifts, and work effectively as a team.

Conclusion of the Action Scene

Narrators should remain adaptable in resolving the Action Scene via roleplay, taking cues from how the Protagonists interact with the Conductors. If the Protagonists discern the illusion and confront the Conductors about the fa√ßade, acknowledging the absence of real danger, the Action Scene may conclude through this realization.

Alternatively, after a few Cycles of interaction, the Conductors will have gauged the Coalition's capabilities. The Conductors' objective is not to defeat the Protagonists but to stretch their abilities to the limit. Hence, once they've sufficiently assessed the Coalition's potential, they may choose to bring the scene to a close, having achieved their goal of testing the Protagonists' limits.

The City

üëÅÔ∏è The ‚ÄúCity‚Äù

As reality warps around you, space itself seems to bend and twist. Next to each of you, a portal materializes, revealing a testament to Metanthrope ingenuity. Inside, you gaze upon a nexus of various locations, each portal a gateway to a different Timeline. A crossroad across space and time. There's an innate feeling among you that this crossroads of destinies is precisely where you were meant to arrive today.

Resolutions

It is important to allow your Players to react to the exposition dialogue of the Conductors. Ask them how do they react, how do they feel about what they‚Äôve heard, which are their inner thoughts, what do they do, and which questions do they ask the Conductors.

Where and When

"You stand in an inter-Timeline dimension, a crossroad outside space and time, a nexus of infinite possibilities. This place, appearing as an opera theater but actually a city of portals, was created by Metanthropes from the Prime Timeline. Its purpose: a haven for Conductors to oversee Timelines and discover Metanthropes like yourselves.

Why and Who

You were drafted here by us, because we saw potential in you and we wanted to see what you can do, as a Coalition - when pushed to your limits, when your life is threatened‚Ä¶ and you didn‚Äôt disappoint].

We, the Conductors are assigned by the Orchestrators to find new Metanthropes, introduce them to the greater world around, them and ‚Äì should they choose to ‚Äì recruit Metanthropes to join forces against looming Multiversal threats‚Äîentities that threaten the fabric of existence across Timelines.

The Multiversal Threat(S)

These cosmic entities, shrouded in mystery, manipulate reality, posing a dire menace to all Timelines. Their corrupting influence spreads like a virus, infecting the essence of each reality they touch.

Their motivations and origins remain veiled in mystery, their intentions inscrutable to mortal minds. Their infiltration into different Timelines bears devastating consequences as they infect the core of each reality they encounter.

Conclusion:

The Prime Timeline is an elusive concept where the true Orchestrators of the cosmic symphonies weave all the threads of the Timelines into a grand overarching cosmic symphony. From the Prime Timeline it is the Multiversal Factions which operate across myriads of Timelines.. An assembly of Metanthropes united by a shared purpose that transcends the boundaries of any single realm.

We invite you to join a Multiversal Faction, to operate across realms and Timelines. Each mission is a journey into the unknown, a challenge to unravel mysteries, and an opportunity to evolve your abilities.

WHAT WOULD ACT III be ‚Ä¶ is up to you to figure out‚Ä¶

The Future is Yours to Shape

Your role in the cosmos is pivotal. As Timelines interweave and threats mount, your journey across the Multiverse is a testament to your resolve and potential to shape all existence. . As the Multiverse stands on the precipice, will you rise to fulfill your destined role ?

But that, as they say, is a story for another time."

The Usher bows, the curtain closes, and the story concludes
